1.title: After Shelby
1.plot: In the aftermath of his granddaughter Shelby leaving for the UK to be with her mother, Grandpa Potts (Dave Wall) tries to keep busy by working non-stop at the Toy Pott. With the help of a clueless Gus (John Swanson), Grandpa Potts goes to war with twenty kids and the newest in water gun technology. Meantime Kincaid (Michael T. Lombardi) returns from holiday in England to find that a lot has changed in Grandpaville. Get set to meet some new faces, and go new places as Welcome to Grandpaville returns for an unforgettable Season 2.

2.title: Invasion of the Slumber Party Punks
2.plot: Mackenzie (Kailyn Kaluna) and Kendall (Deirdre Robins) invite a group of new girls from school to a slumber party at Mac's house, not knowing that her troublemaker brother Duncan (Eric Murphy) is planning to sabotage the sleepover; Kincaid (Michael T. Lombardi) starts a new job at Samuel L. Clemens Academy; Grandpa Potts gets a visit from two strangely dressed high school boys. Written, produced, and directed by Michael T. Lombardi.

3.title: Monkey See, Monkey Zoo
3.plot: Grandpa Potts (Dave Wall), Kincaid (Michael T. Lombardi), and Kendall (Deirdre Robins) take a group of kids from the Toy Pott to the Zoo for an outing. Once at the zoo, Katie (Allison Bradshaw) and Madison (Jocelyn Vogel) sneak off on their own and attempt to set free some endangered monkeys; Cassidy (Sophie Alter) has a messy encounter with a camel; and Ms. Lloyd (Patty Ascione) has her hands full with some unhappy students. Written, produced, and directed by Michael T. Lombardi.

4.title: Hallotwain
4.plot: (Season Finale) - It's Halloween and everyone is getting ready for the big Monster Bash costume party at Jimbo's. But when Kendall (Deirdre Robins) finds an ancient spell book in the school library and accidentally conjures the ghost of Mark Twain (John Pogson), everything is changed in Grandpaville. Stuck in a post-apocalyptic alternate reality populated by vampires, Kendall must find her way back to her own world before it's too late! Find out what happens on the spooky Season 2 Finale! Written, produced, and directed by Michael T. Lombardi

1.title: House Guest
1.plot: After flying halfway across the country, eleven-year old Shelby arrives at her grandfather's house for an extended stay, but feels like a fish out of water as she tries to get used to her new surroundings. She immediately uses her unique electronics ability and sarcastic personality to give Grandpa Potts (Dave Wall), his British Butler Kincaid (Michael T. Lombardi) and Grandpa's friends a hard time! Welcome to Grandpaville is fun for the whole family! Michael T. Lombardi wrote, directed, and co-stars in the very first episode of Welcome to Grandpaville!

2.title: Spare Parts
2.plot: Grandpa Potts (Dave Wall) and Old Man Gus (John Swanson) road test a kids go-cart prototype that Grandpa has been building. Unfortunately, Grandpa makes the mistake of letting Gus drive, and the results are disastrous. Meantime, Shelby (Isabella Abreu) blatantly ignores Kincaid (Michael T. Lombardi) who had warned her to keep out of the attic, and puts her unusual talents to work by picking the lock and sneaking up into the uppermost part of Grandpa Potts classic Victorian era home. Once upstairs, Shelby finds much more than she expected when she uncovers something ...

3.title: Wilderness Adventure Girls
3.plot: Shelby joins an all-girls scout troop called the Wilderness Adventure Girls, and heads out on an overnight camping trip with her new friend Cassidy, and Kendall along as a CIT. Lead by militaristic head councilor Miss Mustard, and second in command Alice Harvey, Camp Wilderness should be a growing, learning experience for girls of all ages. But when snotty rich girl teen campers Gwen and Daphne enlist the help of a couple of dimwitted high school boys to pull pranks on Miss Mustard and the other campers, the camp is turned upside down with hilarious results.

4.title: Runaway Mummy
4.plot: It's a stormy late night at the Toy Pott as Old Man Gus mistakenly takes delivery of an ancient Egyptian Mummy sarcophagus. As the storm intensifies, The Mummy somehow awakens from his eternal slumber and gets loose! Elsewhere, Kincaid has a run-in with the neighborhood Paperboy, while Grandpa Potts deals with his annoying kid neighbor Duncan, before teaming-up with Shelby and a few of her friends on a wild goose chase to find the Mummy before he wreaks havoc!

imdb.plot outline: Desmond Potts is owner of The Toy Pott, a successful toy store where he builds, sells, and collects unique toys for children & adults. He lives a simple life. But when his 11 year-old granddaughter Shelby comes to stay with him for an extended period of time, Desmond faces his biggest challenge yet: being a full-time grandfather to a precocious preteen, who is a wiz at electronics and a challenge to his sanity! As Shelby settles into her new surroundings, she gets to know the people who are part of Grandpa Potts's extended family. There's Kincaid, a live-in British "butler" who maintains Grandpa's house & grounds; Old Man Gus, Grandpa's 70-something hard of hearing handyman who works at The Toy Pott; Kendall, a book smart but slightly socially awkward high school student who works part-time at the store; and Spare Parts, a life sized toy robot with a personality! Along the way, Shelby makes some new friends, joins an all-girls wilderness troop, has a run-in with an Egyptian Mummy, and finds out that living with Grandpa Potts is more fun than she would have imagined! For Shelby, it's a brand new world!
imdb.title: Welcome to Grandpaville

But when his 11 year-old granddaughter Shelby comes to stay with him for an extended period of time, Desmond faces his biggest challenge yet: being a full-time grandfather to a precocious preteen, who is a wiz at electronics and a challenge to his sanity! As Shelby settles into her new surroundings, she gets to know the people who are part of Grandpa Potts's extended family. There's Kincaid, a live-in British "butler" who maintains Grandpa's house & grounds; Old Man Gus, Grandpa's 70-something hard of hearing handyman who works at The Toy Pott; Kendall, a book smart but slightly socially awkward high school student who works part-time at the store; and Spare Parts, a life sized toy robot with a personality! Along the way, Shelby makes some new friends, joins an all-girls wilderness troop, has a run-in with an Egyptian Mummy, and finds out that living with Grandpa Potts is more fun than she would have imagined! For Shelby, it's a brand new world!::Michael T. Lombardi
